headline: Does Margin Pressure From China Tariffs Shift the Long-Term Outlook for Masco (MAS)?
summary: Masco Corporation recently reported its third quarter 2025 results, revealing sales of US$1.92 billion and net income of US$189 million, down in sales but higher in profit compared to the prior year; the company also updated its full-year earnings guidance and affirmed its quarterly dividend at US$0.31 per share. A significant insight is that cost pressures from elevated China tariffs, particularly impacting plumbing and paint segments, contributed to Masco missing Wall Street expectations...
